name: VoiceArcade
0:
”Alexa, open voice arcade”
”Alexa, start voice arcade”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice arcade
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Launch Voice Arcade to find out more information about Voice Arcade Unlimited and stay up-to-date with all of the latest news on Trivia Hero, True or False, Would you Rather and the Daily Quiz!

You can subscribe to Voice Arcade Unlimited in this skill to unlock the full versions of True or False, Trivia Hero, Would you Rather, The Fake News Game, Star Commander & unlimited lives in The Daily Quiz! And much more coming soon!

-- Feedback --
Got a question about Voice Arcade? Want to be the first to know when we release new games? Find something we need to fix? Get in touch with us at hi@voicearcade.com
